32#ifndef _LINUX_LOG2_H_
33#define _LINUX_LOG2_H_
34
35#include <sys/types.h>
36#include <sys/bitops.h>
37
38#include <machine/limits.h>
39
40static inline bool
41is_power_of_2(unsigned long x)
42{
43 return ((x != 0) && (((x - 1) & x) == 0));
44}
45
46static inline unsigned long
47roundup_pow_of_two(unsigned long n)
48{
49 unsigned i;
50
51 if (n == 0)
52 return 1;
53
54 n -= 1;
55 for (i = 1; i < CHAR_BIT * sizeof n; i <<= 1)
56 n |= (n >> i);
57
58 return (n + 1);
59}
60
61static inline unsigned long
62rounddown_pow_of_two(unsigned long n)
63{
64
65 /* XXX fls64 is not fls_ulong, but it'll do for now. */
66 return (1UL << (fls64(n) - 1));
67}
68
69static inline unsigned
70order_base_2(unsigned long n)
71{
72
73 return ilog2(roundup_pow_of_two(n));
74}
75
76#endif /* _LINUX_LOG2_H_ */
77
